Thank you for reading 'Tinkers Compendium' 
Information can be found here on : 
• Tool & Equipment Properties 
• Armor & Material Traits 
• Modifiers & Much More

Crafting a simple set of wooden armor is easy, 
begin with crafting the following : 
• armor station 
• stencil table 
• part table 
Wondering if thats all the mod offers? 
 Upgrade the armor station for some aditional 
 armor types and cosmetic variants.
